Coincidence is God's way of remaining anonymous. - Albert Einstein

I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious. - Albert Einstein

A happy man is too satisfied with the present to dwell too much on the future. - Albert Einstein

If you want to meet a princess, make yourself into a prince. - Rabbi Dov Heller
There are no problems, only opportunities for growth. - Rebbetzin Dena Weinberg
If I am not for me, who is for me; and if I am (only) for myself, what am I. And if not now, when? – Hillel
If you’re going through hell, keep going. - Winston Churchill
But if love is not the cure, it certainly can act as a very strong medicine.  - Stanely Victor Paskavich
There are no bad people, there are people with insufficient information to make appropriate decisions. - Jacque Fresco
If you think we can't change the world, it just means you're not one of those who will. - Jacque Fresco

Learning to be flexible in values takes a long time. - Jacque Fresco
You cannot make a difference unless you’re different - Justin Timberlake
You’re not meant to do what’s easy, you’re meant to challenge yourself. - Justin Timberlake
If you've got a talent, protect it. - Jim Carrey
My focus is to forget the pain of life. Forget the pain, mock the pain, reduce it. And laugh. - Jim Carrey
